member.summary: The Guid Id used to differenciate/identify desired Listings.

member.summary: An int for identifying the category, current list in ListingAddVM.cs

member.summary: The price of the Listing.

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.DateCreated
member.summary: The Date and time that the Listing was created. NEVER CHANGED

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.ProductName
member.summary: The name of the product.

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.Description
member.summary: A short description of the product.

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.Condition
member.summary: The condition of the product. (1 of a couple options only)

member.summary: The address where the Listing is posted from.

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.City
member.summary: The city the posting is set in.

member.name: P:MKTFY.Models.Entities.Listing.DateSold
member.summary: The time and date the Listing was sold, null initially but once assigned NEVER CHANGED.

member.summary: The Id of the user buying the listing.

member.summary: The Status of the transaction, starts as Listing, but changes based on events.
